General.Name: Baid Finserv Limited
General.Description: Baid Finserv Limited operates as a non-banking finance company in India. The company provides car loans, commercial vehicle loans, small and medium enterprise loans, loan against property, and other asset backed loans. It also offers life, dwelling, and motor insurance products. The company was formerly known as Baid Leasing and Finance Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Baid Finserv Limited in July 2022. Baid Finserv Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Jaipur, India.
